ctx: intros d a0 a1 a2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply coacc_transitive_1 with (s1:=MapGet state d a0) (s2:=MapGet state d a1) (pl:=MapGet prec_list (MapGet state d a1) a2).
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a0, a1, a2 : ad H1 : coacc d a0 a1 H2 : coacc d a1 a2 The term "MapGet state d a1" has type "option state" while it is expected to have type "Map prec_list".

ctx: intros d a0 a1 a2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply coacc_nxt with (s1:=MapGet state d a1); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment o : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A S : Set H : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : S) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), o S d a2 = Some s2 -> o S d a1 = Some s1 -> o prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> coacc_transitive_def d a0 a1 -> coacc_transitive_def d a0 a2 d : preDTA a0, a1, a2 : ad H1 : coacc d a0 a1 H2 : coacc d a1 a2 The term "MapGet state d a1" has type "option state" while it is expected to have type "Map prec_list".

original: intros d a0 a1 a2 H1 H2. apply coacc_transitive_1 with (s1:=MapGet state d a0) (s2:=MapGet state d a1) (pl:=MapGet prec_list (MapGet state d a1) a2). - auto. - auto. - auto. - auto. - apply coacc_nxt with (s1:=MapGet state d a1); auto.
